website_summaries.verdict: Still relevant even after its release decades ago, the Adidas Samba Classic lives up to its name. The durability of this soccer cleat has been highly regarded. As far as comfort is concerned, the purchasers were satisfied with how soft the soccer cleats are after breaking them in. However, there were some who were less than happy with the arch support feature found on the insole. The traction gets all praises from reviewers. Overall, this soccer cleat is indeed a good pair given its durability, traction, and comfort.
pros: An overwhelming amount of reviewers lauded the comfort provided by the Adidas Samba Classic soccer cleat
Several wearers love the aesthetic of the pair
An expert reviewer said that the Adidas Samba Classic is a bang for the buck at $70 a pair
This soccer cleat has been praised for its durability with many users disclosing that their pair lasted them several years
A few reviewers noted that the design of the soccer cleat is casual enough to serve as everyday wear
The Adidas Samba Classic provides a good amount of traction, an expert reviewer informed
A significant number of users found the Adidas soccer cleat to be comfortable to wear after breaking them in
The upper provides a nice and consistent touch to the ball, an expert review stated
The Adidas Samba Classic is like the indoor version of the Copa Mundial, an expert reviewer remarked
cons: A number of reviewers shared that because of the gum rubber outsole, the Adidas Samba Classic is on the heavier side of the spectrum
The fit of the soccer cleat is quite narrow so it is not ideal for wide foot types, a notable number of purchasers observed
It is a common complaint among users that the arch support feature in the insole is too high
One reviewer mentioned that it takes a while to break in the soccer cleat

customer_reviews.title: Look great but two issues.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit and look great, well worth the price, but the two issues I have with this is that 1. they squeak really badly because of the material of the tongue, because of this I had to fold the first centimetre of the tongue over to stop it rubbing on the inside of the shoe. And 2. these shoes don't offer a huge amount of grip when walking outside which is fine most of the time, but I've definitely slipped a couple times when it's wet or on certain surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Veitch

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky clean but never mean
customer_reviews.text: They are ok , if you want to be noticed, because they squeak like penguin out of a batman film. They are mainy used in drive bys by dead crips, that bloods can here then from a mile away. If you need a Bob Marley soul shakedown party by local cops then buy a pair
customer_reviews.author: DALE SMART

customer_reviews.title: Very nice (a bit more snug for size than some other brands).
customer_reviews.text: I really like these a lot and they seem to be very nice quality for price. They are a little snugger than the PUMA trainers I had previously but they do still fit (my feet are quite wide) and they are loosening up with wear so I'm not sure that I would have gone the half size up even if I'd been comparing sizes in a high street shoe shop.
customer_reviews.author: Scott O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the original Samba as they have a very thin tread which wears down quickly, but this pair has an 80s Bamba rubber sole / tread. The modern styles of Adidas seem to have a narrower width, so I always order a size up for a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G.

customer_reviews.title: Look great and feel good
customer_reviews.text: The classic 3 stripe Adidas trainer and they look great. Fit is very good, a 12.5 for me. Very difficult to get this size on the high street. They are very well made and feel durable. Suede at the toe and leather uppers, and at a great price. Ordered on the Sunday before Xmas and arrived by the Wednesday pm. Free delivery, well packaged, thanks again Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: starman

customer_reviews.title: Classic Adidas
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable if be it a bit squeaky they have taken a lot if warring to stop the squeak. grip is quite good but after the bad weather we have just had not very good on icy pavements
customer_reviews.author: cameraman

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: They are great and fit well. My only gripe is the typical samba squeaky noise. But I have worn sambas for decades and it's just how they are
customer_reviews.author: Scott carr

customer_reviews.title: Great, no problems
customer_reviews.text: These trainers squeak slightly. I rubbed some Dubbin onto the leather and they have stopped. I usually wear a size 12 but decided to go for the 12 1/2 size and they fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Braddock

customer_reviews.title: Great trainners
customer_reviews.text: Excellent trainners, great quality and look as if they will last a long time. I burn through trainners like nothing else. The sole has an arch to them that takes a bit of getting used to but once accustomed to them they are actually really comfy. The only negative was how long they took to come. I think there was a mix up with the shipping but I dont know how much blame can be given to the seller about that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great looking ,comfortable .
customer_reviews.text: I have had a pair of these before they are very hardwearing.As soon as you get them rub some dubbin or leather care into them ,this will soften the leather and stop any squeaking and will help them pass the sands of time ..Excellent all round shoe
customer_reviews.author: Mr K.

customer_reviews.title: Get the OG, these are rubbish quality compared to them.
customer_reviews.text: Squeaking at me still, after I have wore mine for 6 -8 hours every day for 3 weeks. Crap quality leather
customer_reviews.author: Craig Bell

customer_reviews.title: Always go a half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Addidas samba excellence as always good price great quality and comfort. I normally take a size 11 shoe but for these go half a size more and they fit perfectly, prompt delivery as well
customer_reviews.author: belly d

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Not the trainer I wanted ordered in error not even sure how as thought had something totally different in basket these are no substitute to what did want
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Tinker

customer_reviews.title: Present for my brother he said good fit
customer_reviews.text: They were a Christmas present for my brother he said they are a great fit
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Long

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: An amazing price! Excellent trainers. Will be buying again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my new trainers
customer_reviews.text: I chose these trainers because I have had them before and they are just as comfortable now, smart appearance and comfortable. John Marshall
customer_reviews.author: ronald spencer

customer_reviews.title: Usual Adidas quality
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like about these. Timeless, classic shoe and at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Boydon

customer_reviews.title: excellent service he loves them
customer_reviews.text: bought for partner xmas. excellent service he loves them comfortable
customer_reviews.author: ms l a barnett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trainers
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son at xmas very good trainer and £10 cheaper than the local sport shops around my area.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Classic shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great style, really comfy and feel like they will lay a while.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good but squeaky
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality material. Easy to wipe down however a bit squeaky at first had to use some lubricant to make them less squeaky where the tongue meets the laces.
customer_reviews.author: James Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Brought for my boyfriend for xmas
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loves them, got the for him at Xmas and they are still in good condition. I would recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for fiancé - he loved them, and they came very quickly at a great price
customer_reviews.author: matchamenace

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and size perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what people are on about with the sizes being too small, I'm in adidas and these are no exception, checked the sizing chart as well and all checks out. Very comfy but do tend to squeak like a bugger at times
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Davies

customer_reviews.title: be careful !!!
customer_reviews.text: I take a size 9.5 thought i'd go size 10 seeing as buying on line. These are no way size 10 way to tight although they are marked so. be very careful !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, very well received. Perfect fit. Delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Typical Adidas quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and very comfortable. I am size 9.5 but I ordered size 10 and the fit was good.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Stapley

customer_reviews.title: Classic trainers.
customer_reviews.text: These trainers need a bit of breaking in. Once worn in very comfortable. Got mine for £35. Bargain. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JR Gates

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and look amazing! So so happy with this purchase. Seller was lovely. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fake and doesn't fit the size
customer_reviews.text: I state that I have been refunded. But I'm sick of those who sell fake stuff as "elite" goods I've always brought samba. Unfortunately, they have been back in fashion for a few years now and are priced as absurdly as £ 90. Seeing the opportunity I tried. Clearly false and you can see it from a mile. Broken box and from a different model of shoes. Sole glued with lateral glue smears, completely different color of the sole from the photo. Uncomfortable as if you were wearing a mine boot! Advice, do not waste your money on how much you will spend more money to buy medical insoles as they will destroy your feet and back
customer_reviews.author: Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Trainers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he loves them. They are a perfect fit and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Hutton

customer_reviews.title: Classic quality trainers. Sizing runs small
customer_reviews.text: Great classic adidas trainer. Exchanged for larger as I am a size 10uk normally and they did not fit me.
customer_reviews.author: Bluerangecowboy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: What more do i need to say .Easy to ware.
customer_reviews.author: john holroyd

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Gave me blisters on the outside of my feet even thou they are the right size. Not sure of the origin of these as I dont remember these of old doing that.
customer_reviews.author: S M Findlay

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Samba Classic, Schwarz-weiã Trainers
product_meta.description: This version of the tireless shoes men's Adidas samba samba is presented in a classic style. Leather upper for more lightness and strength. Reinforcements suede for added protection and support. Eva midsole shaped for maximum lightness and comfort. Non-marking rubber outsole for indoor surfaces.
